Detailed Description

template<typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = k_vector<vector_distance<T>, vector_distance<T> >>
struct kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_search_data

Structure holding data for incremental hyperrectangle-hypersphere intersection and nearest neighbour search.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T , const unsigned int D, typename S >
kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_search_data::kd_search_data ( const kd_point &  p,
const kd_point *  data,
unsigned int  K 
) [inline]

Initialize data for a tree search with incremental intersection calculation.

Initialize a data searching structure with incremental hyperrectangle intersection calculation.

Parameters:
p Reference point being used in the search.
data Array of permutated data points.
K Number of neighbours to retrieve.

Member Data Documentation

template<typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = k_vector<vector_distance<T>, vector_distance<T> >>
struct kd_tree::kd_search_data::axis_data kd_tree< T, D, S >::kd_search_data::axis[D]

Axis-ordered point and hyperrectangle structure. Used internally to increase the cache hits.

Per-axis data defined this way to reduce cache misses.
